meta.title: From SAMUEL to SWEET
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Welcome to **RUDDLE**! This week we're rebranding as the only Paul Rudd-themed daily word game. For our final Ruddle, we're going beyond Hollywood all the way to upstate New York. Did you know that Paul Rudd co-owns [Samuel's Sweet Shop](https://samuelssweetshop.com/about/), a candy shop in Rhinebeck, NY?

ladder.clue: Remove the second letter of <> then anagram to get some animals
Change one letter in <> to get a word that comes before <>
Remove one letter in <> to get a kind of organism
In your house, a <> goes in a {}
Append three letters to <> to get a piece of produce
